W12_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: Beyond the door was a world where everything is frozen. Could General's darkness have something to do with this cold? Either way, you should begin searching for captivating darkness.

W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_TITLE.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_TITLE.text: The Final Emperor's Truth and General's Darkness

W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_DETAIL.text: This is the palace where the final emperor is sealed. All of the darkness enveloping Grelon originated here, as did General's own. Something exciting is waiting for you hereâ€”and you're eager to discover it.

W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_TITLE.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_TITLE.text: The Final Emperor's Truth and General's Darkness

W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_DETAIL.text: This is the palace where the final emperor is sealed. All of the darkness enveloping Grelon originated here, as did General's own. You find yourself hoping some evil is waiting for you.

W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_DETAIL.text: This is the palace where the final emperor is sealed. All of the darkness enveloping Grelon originated here, as did General's own. You find yourself hoping some evil is waiting for you.

W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_300_TITLE.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_300_TITLE.text: The Final Emperor's Truth and General's Darkness

W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_300_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_300_DETAIL.text: This is the palace where the final emperor is sealed. All of the darkness enveloping Grelon originated here, as did General's own. You cannot wait to see what you will find here.

W12_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_010_DETAIL.text: You have done what you set out to do in Grelon. The time has come to leave.

W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
